title: [Town Well]
description: Sunlight streaming through a gap in the great oak's branches casts a bright spot on the flagstone court around the old well.  A few flowering weeds thrive in the shadow of the well, adding a splash of color to the city corner.

Moonlight streaming through a gap in the great oak's branches casts a bright sheen on the flagstone court around the old well.  A few flowering weeds thrive in the shadow of the well, adding a splash of color in the darkness.
